__e: If you love her, Duncan, don't make that choice for her.
Duncan, isn't there anything I can say that will change your mind?
Did you just sign up for newspaper so you could be around Duncan?
Why don't you just tell me where Duncan is?
Well, then it's a good thing Mr. Duncan is with my brother.
Is that so Duncan's doing? Or rather by a past do not forget you please?
It belongs to Duncan MacLeod, the guy who signed him out.
Duncan MacLeod, the man I been looking for.
Well, then if you choose to remain Duncan MacLeod, the Highland barbarian... for the rest of your life, so be it.
You would have great pleasure in killing Duncan MacLeod, is not it?
My challenge was to Duncan Macleod, not you, whoever you are.
Yes, Duncan MacLeod, I've no idea why he would do such a thing.
Now it's my turn. And then it's Duncan's turn, and whose turn after that?
I could stand by my dad or stand by Duncan and my dead best friend's family.
Well, after the party, I went over to Duncan's, and we kind of...
A boy like Duncan, it's... just not right is it?
Now that means that either Duncan is a murderer, or he's next on the killer's list, do you understand that?
Duncan is many amazing things, But the settling down type Is not one of them.
